title: React
description: React is a Framework used to build interactive User interfaces

title: Tailwind
description: Tailwind provides a very flexible way of styling components and pages

title: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is known for it's type secured system to catch errors before runtime

title: Firebase

title: Vite

title: PWA
